thread.title_full: Revealed: TV actress Aashka Goradia's wedding plans : What's hot, News - India Today

title: Revealed: TV actress Aashka Goradia's wedding plans : What's hot, News - India Today
text:
A post shared by Aashka Goradia (@aashkagoradia) on Feb 18, 2017 at 7:38am PST Aashka recently revealed that she will marry the love of her life in December this year, according to a report in India Forums. A post shared by Aashka Goradia (@aashkagoradia) on Feb 14, 2017 at 7:12am PST When asked about why the duo had decided on the last month of the year, Aashka confessed that December holds a special place in both their hearts as Brent had proposed the lovely actress in the said month last year. 
Now isn't that lovely? 
The actress also said that the wedding would follow all the traditional Indian wedding rituals as Brent's family are all about the Indian culture. 
Well, we bet it would be one beautiful wedding. For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
